vote.text: Amendment SA 2514 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2514 proposed by Senator Roberts to Amendment SA 2507. (consideration: CR S12653-12655, S12661; text: CR S12653-12654) To propose a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2514 proposed by Senator Roberts to Amendment SA 2507.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2514 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
